string-array.name: isotopesTable_array
string-array.item: create table if not exists Isotopes (Name varchar(255) not null, Abbr char(10) not null)

string-array.name: A1Table_array
string-array.item: create table if not exists A1 (Abbr char(10) not null, Value real)

string-array.item: create table if not exists A2 (Abbr char(10) not null, Value real))

string-array.item: create table if not exists Exempt_Limit (Abbr char(10) not null, Value real)

string-array.name: reportQTable_array
